thread.title: PREVIEW: Kerry Ellis & Velma Celli, The Stage Door, Southampton
thread.title_full: PREVIEW: Kerry Ellis & Velma Celli, The Stage Door, Southampton

title: PREVIEW: Kerry Ellis & Velma Celli, The Stage Door, Southampton
text:
0 comments 
THEY'RE two of the best theatrical vocal talents the UK has to offer. 
Southampton 's The Stage Door has booked its biggest show to date featuring West End and Broadway sensation Kerry Ellis and cabaret diva Velma Celli tomorrow night. 
It promises to be an intimate night of explosive entertainment including some top songs from the shows. 
Dubbed the First Lady of the West End for her starring roles in London and on Broadway, Kerry has also achieved chart-topping success as a recording artist with her debut album Anthems. 
She originated the role of Meat in Queen's We Will Rock You and was the first British Elphaba in Wicked. Her many other leading role credits include Nancy in Oliver! at the London Palladium, Eliza Doolittle inMy Fair Lady, Ellen in Miss Saigon and Fantine in Les Miserables. 
Kerry's first major CD release was the amazing Wicked in Rock, a collaboration with long time friend and Queen guitarist, Brian May. 
She has also performed her own one woman show at the London Palladium. Share article 
Velma Celli is the alter-ego of West End performer and live events producer Ian Stroughair. He has performed in smash hit West End productions including Cats, Fame and Chicago. Ian is also a sought after choreographer and director and has taught at the famous Pineapple Dance Studios in recent years. 
Tickets are available by calling 023 8063 0300. Promoted Stories PREVIEW: Kerry Ellis & Velma Celli, The Stage Door, Southampton
